Articles.Content:
If you get the Krag's Planet Factory mod, one of the bodies added is Thud. It has 3.14 gees of gravity at the surface, but no atmosphere. After "careful" thought, I hyperedited a small probe around it, I did a basic survey of the altitudes at the equator. The results:

Lowest altitude: Around 5.5 km ASL

Average altitude: 10-13 km ASL

Highest altitude ASL: Around 23.5 km ASL

The lowest altitude for a safe, nearly equatorial orbit would thus be around 25 km ASL.

I hope you find this information helpful.

Edited December 27, 2014 by SmartS=true
I once successfully hyperedit tested a Thud lander. Unfortunately, I never got around to actually running the whole mission. Thud is hard.
As this is of interest to those playing modded installs, moved to Add-on Affairs.
